page.title: 13Page 13 Playground Games 2
page.content: 40 40 is played just like Hide and Seek except that when the hider is seen,he runs back to where the counter was,racing the counter,and says "40 40 save all." Then everybody comes out of hiding and the counter starts again. To play French Elastic you need 3 people: 2 have elastic stretched between their ankles and the other jumps in and out of the elastic saying, "England,Ireland,Scotland,Wales, Inside,Outside,Inside,Tread." If she does it without making a mistake she does it again. If she makes a mistake she changes with one of the people holding the elastic. If all is well the elastic is moved to the legs and the game repeated.
